CustomField.formula:
IF(Auto_Renewal__c,"",
IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Need to Submit'), IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01537000000JDqo',""),
IF(AND(Number_of_Received_Quotes__c >= 1, Greater_Premium__c), IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01537000000JDqt',""),
IF(AND(Number_of_Received_Quotes__c >= 1, !Greater_Premium__c), IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01537000000JDJB',""),
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Application Submitted'), Number_of_Open_Quotes__c>=0), IMAGE('/resource/1563975910000/purple',"",16,16),""
)))))
CustomField.label: Quoting Status
